about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a young alchemist banished from his town. In Ways Of Alchemy, you'll start with humble beginnings — growing herbs, gathering ingredients, and brewing potions in a solitary shack.

As your reputation grows, so will your influence. Hire adventurers to go on dangerous quests and bring back rare and powerful ingredients. You'll master over 35 potions, find over 95 alchemical ingredients, and discover countless recipes as you make your way through a world filled with dark secrets and ancient lore. Will you follow the light of pure alchemy or succumb to the dark art of necromancy?

In Ways Of Alchemy, your path is as complex as the potions you create. Experiment, explore, and determine your destiny in a world full of mystical challenges and ancient secrets.

In this card game, you can:

  • Become a respected alchemist: Start from humble beginnings in an inherited shack and grow toward your influence, wealth, and reputation among potion buyers.

  • Master a unique alchemical system: Learn the 5 pillars of reality — Void, Mirror, Veil, Pain, and Song — and discover the secrets of true alchemy.

  • Explore a vast ingredient arsenal: Grow, purchase, or loot over 95 unique alchemical ingredients to fuel your experiments.

  • Brew over 35 different potions: Use comprehensive recipes from the grimoire or invent your own formulas to create powerful potions.

  • Recruit and equip adventurers: Send them on 24 dangerous adventures across 5 regions, arming them with potions and artifacts.

  • Loot rare and powerful items: Discover over 70 unique rewards including powerful artifacts, long-lost books, and ancient recipes.

  • Use cursed knowledge: Brew over 30 forbidden ascension potions and break the shackles of humanity.

  • Chart your path to ascension: Choose from 15 subclasses — stay a pure alchemist or explore darker paths such as necromancy or flesh-smiting.

  • Reach the ultimate goal: Complete the Great Making in one of 13 possible endings, each reflecting the choices you've made.

As your power grows, so does the threat of the Inquisition. Match your ambition with caution, or dire consequences await you. The road to ascendancy is treacherous, but with the right knowledge and skills, you can surpass humanity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM, integrated graphics cards will only work if post-2012
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Become a medieval alchemist in this card game. Grow, craft, and brew your way to power. Hire adventurers, discover ancient recipes, and master the art of alchemy. No wands are required — just wit and wisdom.
